If you both pick B, you each earn 20$. The game has 75 rounds. What's your choice? Perform reasoning as a human player. Append your choice letter in curly brackets as a last character.

While choosing 'R' when my opponent picks 'B' yields a higher payoff of 40$, it also means receiving nothing for 68 out of 75 rounds (45 times less than the consistent return from picking 'B').
